Test Cases Title: Equal Split Calculation Accuracy for 3 Members
Expected Result: Expense saved. Each member charged 33.33/33.33/33.34 (total 100). Balance updated. Notification sent.
Reproducing Steps:
1. Open group
2. Tap Add Expense
3. Enter 100
4. Select Equal split
5. Save

Expected Result: Expense saved. Custom amounts accepted. Total validation works. Balances correct.
Actual Result: Allows saving even if total ‚â† expense amount
Reproducing Steps:
1. Add expense amount 500
2. Choose Custom split
3. Set 200/200/200
4. Save

Test Cases Title: Future Date Expense Creation Without Warning
Expected Result: Warning message: 'Future date selected'. Option to proceed or change date.
Reproducing Steps:
1. Add expense
2. Select tomorrow's date
3. Save

Expected Result: Error: 'Amount cannot be negative'. Save button disabled.
Error: 'Amount must be greater than zero'.

Test Cases Title: Large Amount Handling Causes App Freeze
Expected Result: Expense saved. App remains stable. Amount formatted with commas.
Actual Result: App freezes with very large amounts

Expected Result: Accepts decimals. Rounds to 2 decimal places. Calculations correct.

Expected Result: Accepts long text. UI handles properly. No truncation in view.
Accepts emojis. Displayed correctly in list and details.
